column9: I have been to many of the better restaurants in Lund before I yesterday went to Vendels Matrum. It is a very, very good restaurant. It located in an old brick building that used to be a roundhouse, so the ceiling is very high and...More
Had a lovely evening at Vendels Matrum. Service was good, food was excellent. Fresh ingredients are used to make lovely courses.our compliments to the chef!

column7: Fantastic pizzas from the wood-fired oven
column9: During the summer they do pizza form a wood-fired oven in the back yard. Lots of great selections, many with local ingredients. Don't miss the mushroom pizza, it is fantastic.
